```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(stringr)
library(tibble)
info <- installed.packages() %>% as_tibble %>% filter(Package == "worminfo")
data(ahringerData)
data(geneData)
data(orfeomeData)
```

[Ahringer]: http://www.us.lifesciences.sourcebioscience.com/clone-products/non-mammalian/c-elegans/c-elegans-rnai-library/
[Ensembl]: http://www.ensembl.org/Caenorhabditis_elegans
[ORFeome]: http://worfdb.dfci.harvard.edu
[PANTHER]: http://pantherdb.org
[R]: https://www.r-project.org
[WormBase]: http://www.wormbase.org

*C. elegans* gene annotations dynamically assembled from [WormBase][], [Ensembl][], and [PANTHER][].
Clone mapping support for [ORFeome][] and [Ahringer][] feeding RNAi libraries.

# Installation

This is an [R][] data package.

To install, run `devtools::install_github("seqcloud/worminfo")`

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/seqcloud/worminfo.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/seqcloud/worminfo)

# Annotations

Gene annotations were sourced from
WormBase WS`r list.files(path = "data-raw/wormbase", pattern = "wormpep.table*") %>% str_extract("[0-9]{3}")`,
`r biomaRt::listMarts(host = "useast.ensembl.org") %>% filter(biomart == "ENSEMBL_MART_ENSEMBL") %>% select(version)`
and PANTHER `r list.files(path = "data-raw", pattern = "PTHR*") %>% str_extract("([0-9]{2}\\.[0-9]{1})")`
with `r R.Version()$version.string` running on `r R.Version()$platform`.

- [WormBase][] genes: `r nrow(geneData)`
- [Ahringer][] clones: `r nrow(ahringerData)`
- [ORFeome][] clones: `r nrow(orfeomeData)`

## `geneData`

`r seqcloudr::mdlist(names(geneData), ordered = TRUE)`

## `ahringerData`

`r seqcloudr::mdlist(names(ahringerData), ordered = TRUE)`

## `orfeomeData`

`r seqcloudr::mdlist(names(orfeomeData), ordered = TRUE)`
